name: WEIGHT LOSS PROGRAM NO.1
description: I don't just show you how to do an exercise; I educate you in the areas of strength training, cardiovascular endurance, and proper nutrition.

features.one: PERSONAL TRAINING WITH A COACH - All types of cardio and strength training depending on your health and weight.
features.two: 3-5 / 90 MIN WORKOUTS A WEEK - Welcome to a small group training class, with only 3-4 adults.
features.three: 20 ANAEROBIC AND CARDIO WORKOUTS - Customized and systemized training plan for you

name: WEIGHT LOSS PROGRAM NO.2
description: Understanding the way your body and its processes work and how to influence it is the most important step to your dream body.

features.one: INDIVIDUAL NUTRITION PROGRAM - A variety of group exercise classes that provide cardio & strength training.
features.two: GYM TRAINING - Join a smaller group training class, with only 3-4 adults.
features.three: BASIC CONTROL OF YOUR RESULTS - Individual training program that works for you.

name: WEIGHT LOSS PROGRAM NO.3
description: A professionally developed personal training program that was created specifically for you will take you as far as you want to go.

features.one: REGULAR CONSULTATIONS - Interactive trainings and exciting current topics thoroughly researched.
features.two: DAILY CONTROL OF YOUR RESULTS - You can try a small group training class, with only 3-4 adults.
features.three: SPECIAL NUTRITION PROGRAM - Your journey into a new lifestyle starts here!.
